description: A body of structured information describing some topic(s) of interest.

alias.description: User-defined identifier of this dataset (max. 30 characters).

headline.description: Headline that describes this dataset (max. 110 characters).

abstract.description: Short description that summarizes this dataset (max. 200 words; no references).

dataDescriptor.description: Extensive description of this dataset including references to relevant publications.

changeLog.description: Record of all notable changes made to this dataset compared to its previous version.

license.description: Link to license document that applies to this dataset.

releaseDate.description: Date (actual or intended) of first broadcast/publication of this dataset.

conditionsOfAccess.description: General condition that defines the availability of this dataset.

doi.description: Digital Object Identifier (DOI) assigned to this dataset.

contributors.description: Link to list of persons that were involved in the creation/publication of this dataset.

ethicsApproval.description: Link to ethics approvals that are valid for the procedures applied in this dataset.

funding.description: Link to funding information of this dataset.

isNewVersionOf.description: Link to previously released version of this dataset.

isPartOf.description: Lists larger research projects in which context this content was created.

wasPerformedOn.description: Lists subjects and/or tissue samples of this study.

isDescribedBy.description: Lists publications/sources or files that contain a descriptive documentation of this content.

isBasedOn.description: Lists the publications/sources from which this content is derived or from which it is a modification or adaption.

usedMethodsAndOrParadigms.description: Lists the techniques used to produce this content.
